Title: Ted
Plot: Buffy has parental issues when Joyce comes home with a boyfriend, the computer expert and master chef Ted; whose charming personality impresses everyone. Everyone except Buffy that is, who is not at all willing to give her mother up to someone else.
GuestStars: Jeff Langton, John Ritter, Ken Thorley, James G. MacDonald, Jeff Pruitt, Kristine SutherlandRobia LaMorte
